name: Icejade Tremora
text: You can send this card from your hand to the GY; Special Summon 1 WATER monster from your hand. If a face-up WATER monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect, while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 "Icejade" monster from your hand or GY, except "Icejade Tremora". You can only use each effect of "Icejade Tremora" once per turn.
